items.sentence: Tom had no qualms at all about speaking in front of such a large audience.
Tom has been an inmate of a high-security prison for the past three years.
Tom pleaded not guilty to charges of drunken driving and reckless driving.
Would you mind putting a link on your web page to our company\'s web site?
Don\'t you think this computer game may be a little too difficult for Tom?
Tom and Mary have decided not to talk to their children in French anymore.
Tom and Mary were sitting together on the couch when I came into the room.
Tom asked Mary a lot of questions, but she refused to answer some of them.
Tom is often the first one to arrive at a party and the last one to leave.
She borrowed the book from him many years ago and hasn\'t yet returned it.
